contents:
83 Bringing in foreign talent to train Americans doesn't require a 6 year H-1B visa. They can come for 1 or 2 or 3 months to accomplish training (without bringing their entire family). 

No need to buy a house or set down roots. No need to enroll their children in the school system. posted 15 hours ago by PiratePatriotParrot 6 comments award share report block Wall Street Mav @WallStreetMav • 18h Bringing in foreign talent to train Americans doesn't require a 6 year H-1B visa. They can come for 1 or 2 or 3 months to accomplish training (without bringing their entire family). No need to buy a house or set down roots. No need to enroll their children in the school system.
